name: Sensual VR
description: Can you escape with Mr. Purple? In this real sensual VR experience, made for ladies, you can experience the sensuality of All Shades. If you complete your task, be submissive and be gentle to Mr. Purple you can fly by luxe helicopter over the world and discover the most wonderful places in world.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 (equivalent or better) Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 (equivalent or better) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 (equivalent or better) Memory: 5 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 (equivalent or better) DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
